TopicTitle: How do you check who has done activities on mission?

Articles.Content:
I was inattentive and saved with Bill outside of the mun lander. As a result, the Kraken eats him on load.

I have a save that only costs me an hour of play, but I can't tell which crew members have already landed.

Is there any way to check what Kerbals have done in mission?

- - - Updated - - -

Found it under Flight_Log when restoring from another save. The one I was inspecting was missing it somehow.
